Howdy

Hi! I am Tushar Sharma. I'm from Dehradun. Currently I'm staying at Bangalore. I have pursued Senior Certificate from University of Florida. I am a B.Tech Graduate in Electronics and Communication from JUIT.

I am a avid blogger and voracious reader. I am passionate about FOSS, occasionally like to dip my pen into poetry and also harbour interest in literature. Besides I spend my time solving interesting problems and participating in online discussion forums. Here is some of my presentation on Speaker Deck.
